name: DigLoop
description:
Dig Loop is a super-short, minimal digging game. Drill through rocks , avoid the falling blocks , find treasure, upgrade your drill and try to make it to the bottom!

Controls

DrillHold Space BarDrill DirectionUse Arrow Keys while Space Bar is held downMoveArrow KeysEnter DoorwayPress Up Arrow when standing over doorway

Upgrading your Drill

To upgrade your Drill, drill through the shop block at the top of the level. You need to collect enough treasure  to unlock each upgrade.
